description:
St. Louis Cardinals coverage from the staff of the Post-Dispatch and stltoday.com. Daily updates from our columnists and writers, photo galleries, and, new for 2011, a live scoreboard and video updates. 
  
The Post-Dispatch app will feature pregame analysis from Hall of Famer Rick Hummel, in-game updates from beat writers Joe Strauss and Derrick Goold and commentary from Bernie Miklasz, Jeff Gordon and Bryan Burwell. 
  
Our player-by-player feeds allow you to easily follow your favorite Cardinal. 
  
You'll see dozens of photos from each Cardinals game as well as regular video updates. 
  
The stats package gives you up-to-date Cardinals information and a scoreboard from around the league. 
  
Simple and easy to navigate supporting an optimized reading experience from your mobile device.

Key features: 

1.Instant, real-time access to the latest Cardinals news from the St. Louis Post-Dispatch. 

2. Multi-media includes photo galleries of games and Cardinal greats as well as video features. 

3. No need to manually update, your application automatically refreshes with the most up to date content.

4. Ability to read and access content offline a without network connection and/or save stories for later reading. 

5. Share content via email or through social networking sites like Twitter and Facebook.
